statements: SELECT * FROM data_pipelines;
SELECT pipeline_name, source_location FROM data_pipelines;
SELECT id, pipeline_description FROM data_pipelines WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM data_pipelines WHERE destination_location LIKE '%warehouse%';
SELECT pipeline_name, destination_location FROM data_pipelines ORDER BY pipeline_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM data_pipelines ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT pipeline_name, pipeline_description FROM data_pipelines WHERE id > 5;
SELECT destination_location, source_location FROM data_pipelines WHERE pipeline_name LIKE 'ETL%';
SELECT * FROM data_pipelines WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT pipeline_name, destination_location FROM data_pipelines WHERE pipeline_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM pipeline_data;
SELECT data_key, data_value FROM pipeline_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM pipeline_data ORDER BY data_key;
SELECT data_key, data_value, id FROM pipeline_data WHERE id > 5;
SELECT data_key, data_value FROM pipeline_data WHERE data_key LIKE 'ab%';
SELECT * FROM pipeline_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT data_key, data_value FROM pipeline_data WHERE data_key LIKE 'user%';
SELECT * FROM processed_data WHERE pipeline_id = 5 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT pipeline_id, jsonb_pretty(processed_value) FROM processed_data WHERE pipeline_id IN (3, 7) AND pipeline_id <> 5;
SELECT pipeline_id, AVG(jsonb_array_length(processed_value)) AS avg_processed_value_length FROM processed_data GROUP BY pipeline_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT * FROM DataIngestion;
SELECT id, source, timestamp FROM DataIngestion ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, data_id, processing_type FROM DataProcessing WHERE processing_type = 'Type1';
SELECT id, stored_data FROM DataStorage WHERE id > 100;
SELECT id, source, data FROM DataIngestion WHERE source LIKE '%system%';
SELECT * FROM DataIngestion;
SELECT source, timestamp FROM DataIngestion WHERE id = 1;
SELECT data_id, processing_type, processing_timestamp FROM DataProcessing ORDER BY processing_timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, stored_data FROM DataStorage WHERE storage_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT d.id, d.source, dp.processing_type, ds.stored_data FROM DataIngestion d JOIN DataProcessing dp ON d.id = dp.data_id JOIN DataStorage ds ON ds.id = dp.id;
SELECT * FROM Ingestion;
SELECT data_source, ingestion_timestamp FROM Ingestion
SELECT id, data_id, processing_status, processing_timestamp FROM Processing;
SELECT storage_location, storage_timestamp FROM Storage;
SELECT log_id, activity_description, log_timestamp FROM Logs;
SELECT * FROM Ingestion ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT data_source, ingestion_timestamp FROM Ingestion WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Processing WHERE processing_status = 'Completed' ORDER BY processing_timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, storage_location FROM Storage ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT log_id, activity_description, log_timestamp FROM Logs WHERE log_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM data_ingestion WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM data_processing WHERE processing_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT job_name, start_time, end_time FROM pipeline_jobs WHERE job_name = 'Data Pipeline';
SELECT log_timestamp, log_message FROM job_logs WHERE job_id = 5 ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, stored_date, stored_data FROM data_storage WHERE stored_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM data_ingestion;
SELECT id, timestamp, data FROM data_processing ORDER BY processing_date DESC;
SELECT job_name, start_time, end_time FROM pipeline_jobs WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01' AND end_time < '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, stored_date, stored_data FROM data_storage WHERE stored_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT job_id, log_timestamp, log_message FROM job_logs WHERE job_id = 5 ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
